department.ch: 工業管理研究所碩士班

goal.en: To provide guidance to Ph.D. students on how to start their individual research.

content.en:
"This course aims at teaching Ph.D. students at our institute how to read and criticize a journal paper. More importantly, this course wishes to inspire Ph.D. students ideas about their own research. Therefore, the following is how this course will proceed throughout the semester.
A) In general, each Ph.D. student will present twice or three times during the entire semester. The content of the presentation will be papers chosen by the presenter from his or her research field.
B) The presenter is required to make sure that the entire class understand the selected paper in sufficient detail. Moreover, the presenter will be asked to criticize the paper, for example, strengths and limitations of the proposed methodology in the paper."

textbook.en: Materials for this course will be the papers chosen by the presenting student.

grading.en: Each presentation counts evenly for the final grade of this course.

ch.competency: 獨立思考和解決問題能力
